name: Auroria
startIntroPart1: Welcome to the kingdom of Auroria. I am Queen Adalyn, and I invite you to explore the wonders of our land.
startIntroPart2: The sea has always been a source of life and prosperity for us, and we hope to continue to use its resources to thrive.
declaringWar: You leave us no choice but to defend ourselves. Prepare to face the might of Auroria!
attacked: How dare you attack us! We will fight to protect our land and our people!
defeated: We have been defeated, but our spirit will never be broken.
introduction: Auroria is a land of innovation and discovery. We seek to push the boundaries of knowledge and technology to better ourselves and our world.
hateHello: What do you want? Speak quickly.
tradeRequest: Let us trade and benefit from our mutual prosperity.
uniques: +1 Science from every Coast tile worked
+2 Food from every Fishing Boat improvement

name: Zarath
startIntroPart1: We are the Zarathian Empire, proud and undefeated!
startIntroPart2: Our armies are the greatest in the world!
declaringWar: You have trespassed on our land. We shall show you the might of the Zarathian military!
attacked: You dare to attack the Zarathian Empire? You will regret this!
defeated: You have won this battle, but the war is far from over!
introduction: Welcome to the glorious Zarathian Empire, where strength and discipline are our guiding principles. We will not hesitate to use force to protect our interests!
tradeRequest: We are not interested in your goods, unless they can be used to strengthen our army.
uniques: [+10% Combat Strength] for all units in friendly territory
No Maintenance costs for Barracks and Armories

name: Lanvaria
startIntroPart1: Greetings from the far away land of Lanvara
startIntroPart2: As Lanvaran people, we welcome you to our lands.
declaringWar: You have wronged us for the last time. Prepare to face the consequences.
attacked: How dare you! Lanvar will never falter!
introduction: Lanvara is a land of rich culture, we welcome you to our realms.
neutralHello: Greetings, what brings you to our land?
tradeRequest: A trade may be in our best interest.
uniques: +1 Culture from every Jungle tile worked
+2 Science from every Lumber Mill Improvement

name: Caspia
startIntroPart2: You once brought your great nation out of the ashes of devastation into glory. Can you do it again?
declaringWar: You've finally gone too far. Prepare to die in battle!
attacked: You've made a mistake! Glory to Caspia!
defeated: We have been defeated, but our glory will live on in history.
introduction: Caspia is a prosperous nation, culturally rich. Once powerful in history, raised from the ashes of a great war.
tradeRequest: A trade might benefit us both.

uniques.name: Trinaco
uniques.startIntroPart2: The mighty Trinacan Union fell once to battle, after a mighty reign! Can you raise it back to glory?
uniques.declaringWar: Prepare to face Trinaco in battle.
uniques.attacked: We will defend our nation until our final breath!
uniques.introduction: Trinaco was a mighty nation of communal governance and military might. Can they be raised back to glory once more?
uniques.tradeRequest: We could both use a trade
